'''1.12.1.1''' is a major update for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on September 3, 2019, that updates the servers for [[Bedrock Edition 1.12.1]].

== Changes ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* Updated for 1.12.1 clients.
